EventViva Feature: Ticket Embeds

Now you can embed EventViva tickets on your own website for sale. Just create your event on EventViva and get your unique embed code for the event.

For clarity, check the image below. That is where your unique ticket embed code is located:

And this is what your code will look like:

So from today, you can start embedding tickets to your events anywhere - on your own website, on your own web-portal or on your own ticket management system.

More cool features are going to get added to EventViva as and when we feel we are happy with them. But the ticket selling is surely going to get more exciting. We assure you that!

Published on October 3, 2013.

Epilogue

Thanks for reading the article! There's plenty more to read if you liked this one. My company also develops Octalbonescript and has open-sourced it. My work/interest aligns towards jQuery, Node.js, AJAX, AngularJS, front-end web-development and software-hardware system design.

For any questions on open-source hardware, software development and any other projects, reach out on hardik@hardik.org or tweet (@hvpandya) me.
